# rgb-to-hex

> Convert rgb value to hex


## Install

```
$ npm install --save rgb-to-hex
```


## Usage

```js
var rgbToHex = require('rgb-to-hex');

rgbToHex('rgb(100, 40, 30)');
//=> '64281E'
```


## API

### rgbToHex(input)

#### input

*Required*
Type: `string`

Put rgb string and get hex
